      • genEvents

        public void genEvents​(javax.sound.midi.Track track,
                      int timeLoc,
                      int volume)
               throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException
        Add's this note as a javax.midi.MidiEvent to the given javax.midi.Track
        Parameters:
        track - The track to add the note to
        timeLoc - The position (in milliseconds) to add the note at
        volume - The volume at which to play the note (0-127)
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException - If the MidiEvent fails to initialize
        Since:
        1.10.0

        public int getDuration​(java.lang.String tempo)
        Recalculates the duration of the note based on the song's tempo
        Parameters:
        tempo - The song's tempo
        Returns:
        The duration of the note in this song (in milliseconds)
        Since:
        1.10.0
